content: How to Feed Me the Chat for Tagging} \\ \\ \text{1. \textbf{Prepare the Chat Segments:}} \\ \quad \text{- Split the chat into segments of approximately 10,000 to 20,000 characters each.} \\ \quad \text{- Use natural breakpoints in the conversation, such as changes in topic or task, to determine where to split.} \\ \quad \text{- Number each segment sequentially (e.g., Segment 1, Segment 2, etc.).} \\ \quad \text{- For each segment, write a brief description (1-2 sentences) of the main topic or task discussed.} \\ \\ \text{2. \textbf{Send the Segments to
